mapper.insert: insert into factory_staff (factory_id, staff_phonenum, staff_name, staff_sex, staff_password, staff_class, staff_birthday, staff_pcrdnumber,staff_place) values (#{factory_id}, #{staff_phonenum}, #{staff_name}, #{staff_sex}, #{staff_password}, #{staff_class}, #{staff_birthday}, #{staff_pcrdnumber},#{staff_place});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from factory_staff WHERE staff_phonenum = #{phoneNum};
